plot: Shot during the 64th Annual Festival de Cannes, Neigeme Glasgow-Maeda (Caribbean Film Corner) discusses the responsibility of Black filmmakers, Caribbean Cinema, and how to network successfully at the festival.
title: Conversations in Cannes: With Neigeme Glasgow-Maeda
plot_es: Shot during the 64th Annual Festival de Cannes, Neigeme Glasgow-Maeda (Caribbean Film Corner) discusses the responsibility of Black filmmakers, Caribbean Cinema, and how to network successfully at the festival.
original_name: Conversations in Cannes: With Neigeme Glasgow-Maeda
plot_en: Shot during the 64th Annual Festival de Cannes, Neigeme Glasgow-Maeda (Caribbean Film Corner) discusses the responsibility of Black filmmakers, Caribbean Cinema, and how to network successfully at the festival.
